comment.body: @Elspru: Have the same error in my angularJS site with firefox. There should not be any XUL calls. I think maybe the problem is a memory leek. Restarting the comp. helped for 2-3 hours. Changing to chrome "solved" my problem.
Buffalo Soldier: Infinity years remaining :-)
@PaintNinja: Video downloaded in 2-3 minutes but don't start. I am using chrome 46.0.2490.86. Reloaded page. Download restarts.
Will do that for a few days. Tried your demo in firefox. Very nice work
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/
Change log has been updated now
Added 5 da.json files. Nice and easy to translate ZeroNet

ZeroNet solves some problems but it is a problem that everything we writes in here is public. Too little focus on privacy and encryption in ZeroNet sites. Very easy to collect all data for a ZeroNet cert and find out everything about that user.
Here Ubuntu as OS and windows 10 in a virtual machine. Works fine. Can always suspend my windows VM when I am not using it.

I am almost the same problem. content.json about 1 Mb. Here about 16.000 small optional png files (emoji). I will try firefox example with a separate content.json file for the png files and free my main content.json from a very long list of optional files
@Firebox: Thank you
Nice to travel back in time :-) What about the missing newsfeed / search if there has been no activity for the last <n> days. A link on hello page to show/hide newsfeed would be nice ...
Nice :-) Chrome. Play speed > download speed. Music stops and do not start again when data is ready. Any way to delete a downloaded music track other than using ZeroHello and files tab?
Looking forward to faster image and optional file loading. What is "Liked" listing option for ZeroMe posts?
Is "textid" and "sufid" unique in your html code?
Maybe someone made him an offer he couldn't refuse ... :-)
Q: Nice with a test of ZeroNet crypt API functions. Everything OK here. But why shouldn't is always work?! Personal I have dropped ZeroMail. Zite too big and I never got any mails ;-)
OK. Where can I find info about this new feature?
